Bie Lee Kopf put his ideas also tried to hide in a bush.

sentences.english: The fact is that when you use two condoms, these two condoms end up rubbing against each other and generating a great deal of friction.

sentences.english: That said, whenever you choose to do it, make sure you use one of these condoms.

sentences.english: The seat-covers on the train had been ripped by vandals.

sentences.english: In hot weather, this plastic cover throws off an uunpleasant odour.

sentences.english: The car should be housed with a cover for a longer time's parking.
